descriptionHTML:
Triplex Classic watch face for Android Wear smartwatches: Huawei Watch, Sony SmartWatch, Motorola Moto 360, Tag Heuer, Fossil Q, LG G Watch, Asus ZenWatch etc.This watchface is compatible only with Android Wear smartwatches. Triplex Classic watch face displays all minimal information which you need. Full textual date representation includes: day of the month and month name. Also on this watch face exist battery indicators, which are displaying battery levels of watches and phone.

Watch face features:
✔ Support both round and square displays
✔ Watchface for Android Wear watches
✔ Battery level
✔ Ambient mode
✔ Day of the week
✔ Day of the month
✔ Display seconds

How to use watch face for Android Wear smartwatches:
1. Once you install the app, the watchface will be automatically transferred to your watch. This may take a few minutes. You may have to wait for a while.
2. From smartwatches: Long press your watchface and select the one that you have installed.
From mobile: Run the "Android Wear" app and tap "More" button in the watchface section.
3. Enjoy your new Triplex Classic Watch Face for Android Wear!
